document_data.name: Amplify
document_data.mainbody: '''''Amplify''''' was a simple [[alteration]] [[spell]] used to alter the volume of sound. This spell was created by the famed [[wizard]] [[Darsson Spellmaker]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster the change the volume of sounds near the spell's area of effect, lasting for several hours depending on the skill of the caster. The effected disk-shaped area glowed softly from the magic's effects. Sound entering the caster's side of the disk exited up to five times louder or softer than the original sound.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a cone of [[paper]] to cast.
